value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Hmmm... Where is... Huh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Well, this is where the king would
have come to perform the formal
rites of ascension to the throne.$k$pThe rite involves climbing from the
bottom of the mountain to the tower
and placing a treasure on the altar...$k$p$EFace_Pain|But...I don't see Fáfnir's treasure
here anywhere.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Did Fáfnir...not perform the rite?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|He did! Well, he took a treasure and
climbed this mountain...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|But he went alone, right?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|W-well, of course, but not becau—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is this the treasure he carried?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-that's it!$k$p...Why do you have it, Prince Alfonse?
Where did you find it?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It was on the ground outside as we
approached the tower. It seems to
have been thrown into the thicket.$k$pIt was $Nu who
found it.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But...why would— He said he gave
his treasure as an offering!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|He was unable to open the gate, in
all likelihood. Blocked from making
his offering, he tossed it aside.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then...what does that mean for us?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You mentioned that only the royal
line is able to enter the tower, right,
Princess Reginn?$k$pHow does the tower recognize
someone as king?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|To be claim the throne, you need
to have the Crown of the Dvergar
and be born of Niðavellir...$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|He bore the crown. Which can mean
only that he is not born of Niðavellir.
Is that not the case?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's possible... As I understand it,
Fáfnir lost all of his memories.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-then...just who IS my brother?
And where did he come from?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As of now, we have no way
of knowing.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's possible even he doesn't know
anything about his past life...$k$pBut if the fact that he's not born
of this realm were to become widely
known, he could be deposed.$k$pIt's likely that is the reason why
he didn't tell anyone...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Aha! And maybe Ótr knows
the truth...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right. He probably found the
treasure as well, and threw it
into the thicket himself.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's all great, but...the only thing
this tells us is that he isn't from
Niðavellir, right?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|We've gained insight into our foe.
It is a step in the right direction.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|What step comes next then? Do we
pursue Ótr and Eitri?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hmmm... Making our way back down
the mountain will be dangerous after
dark—we should hurry.$k$p$Sbs150|
$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|I'll make you my extra-special lunch!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_05,0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...Reginn...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Wh-who's there?$k$pYou were the one who called out to
me at the foot of the mountain,
weren't you...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|You have done well, child of our
blood... Wrest the crown from the
heretic... Return it to rightful hands...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The...heretic? Do you mean Fáfnir?
But...but I—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn? Who are you
talking to?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-huh? You can't hear it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-hear what? ...I'm not falling for
this trick again! Anyway, I came
to tell you it's nearly time to go.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Right... Of course.$k$p$Sbs150|
